properties.name: batch.output.file.path
properties.description: Path to the output VDYP projection results CSV file

properties.name: batch.output.directory.default
properties.description: Default output directory for VDYP batch processing partition files

properties.name: batch.partitioning.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable VDYP partitioning for parallel forest data processing

properties.name: batch.partitioning.grid.size
properties.description: Number of partitions for parallel VDYP projection processing

properties.name: batch.partitioning.chunk.size
properties.description: Number of VDYP forest records processed in each chunk

properties.name: batch.retry.max.attempts
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for VDYP projection failures

properties.name: batch.retry.backoff.period
properties.description: Backoff period in milliseconds between VDYP projection retries

properties.name: batch.skip.max.count
properties.description: Maximum number of VDYP forest records that can be skipped due to errors
